parentQuestions.title: 4. Which variables will be measured during the assessment?
parentQuestions.hint: Note that the variables are associated with the attributes of usability. The ones that have not been filled with the goals descriptions should not have variables associated.

parentQuestions.title: 5. How will the listed variables be obtained?
parentQuestions.instruction: Describe the methods and criteria for measuring each of the variables listed above.

parentQuestions.title: 6. Which of the suggested scales will be used?
parentQuestions.hint: Note that it is possible to choose multiple scales.
